Managing Director â€“ Investment Banking Technology & Telecommunications Group

Mr. Kelley, who joined Raymond James in 2007, has covered the enterprise software sector for more than a decade. He has advised on and executed public and private equity and equity-linked underwritings, syndicated bank and bond financings, leveraged buyouts, and buy- and sell-side Mergers and Acquisitions assignments. Prior to joining Raymond James, Mr. Kelley was the head of application software investment banking at Banc of America Securities.

Mr. Kelley holds a Bachelor of Science in finance from Pennsylvania State University and a Master of Business Administration from New York Universityâ€™s Leonard N. Stern School.
